attributes.action: To change legislations and policies,yet again for protecting and safeguarding children
attributes.additional_details: To change policies and legislation for child protection and safeguarding children..Children have been let down for too long now and something needs to be done!No innocent child should have to be put through neglect,to go as far as torture!!Even after all the legislation and lord Lamings report around Victoria Climbie and Peter Conelly, children are still being abused, neglected and at the most ugly end, dying!!...Ed Balls passed all of Lord Lamings reccommendations but nothing seems to be happening to protect the most vulnerable of our society..as they say"'Every Child Matters"! X
